summary: This is an email chain between employees of SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions regarding an order for security cameras to be shipped to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The email is dated August 20, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death at the MCC.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 19-20, 2019, regarding an order for security cameras to be shipped to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The order is placed shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death at the MCC on August 10, 2019, suggesting possible post-incident security upgrades.
The correspondence is between employees of SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions, a contractor for the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP).
